mapper.select: select a.prod_id from `trade_order_detail` a where `trate_order_id` = #{tradeOrderId} AND `prod_type` = #{prodType}

select a. `rec_id`,a.`trate_order_id`,a.`original_price`,a.`present_price`,a.`name`,a.`prod_type`,a.`prod_id`,a.`intro`,a.`preferential_way`,a.`status`,a.`create_id`,a.`create_time`,a.`update_id`,a.`update_time` ,l.name resource_name ,l.banner resource_cover from `trade_order_detail` a join lesson l ON a.prod_id = l.rec_id where a.`trate_order_id` IN ( select b.rec_id from `trade_order` b where b.`buy_id` = #{userId} AND b.status=1 ) AND a.`prod_type` = #{type}
limit ${startIndex}, ${pageSize}

select a.*,l.name resource_name ,l.cover resource_cover from `trade_order_detail` a join book l ON a.prod_id = l.rec_id where a.`trate_order_id` IN ( select b.rec_id from `trade_order` b where b.`buy_id` = #{userId} AND b.status=1 ) AND a.`prod_type` = #{type}
limit ${startIndex}, ${pageSize}
